MainContent.description: Llamasad is a website digital platform showcase of my profile, delivering engaging content.
MainContent.extraDescription: This platform serves as a comprehensive repository for my professional curriculum vitae, as well as a personal space for tracking and reflecting on my ongoing professional development.

ExplainWhy.title: What is the origin or meaning of the name “Llamasad” ?
ExplainWhy.answer: The Llamas, a distinct breed of camel, serves as a symbol of tenacity and intellectual curiosity. This creature embodies my approach to work, reflecting my perseverance and propensity for thoughtful deliberation.In fact, I chanced upon a video that showcased a camel unexpectedly spitting in the face of an unsuspecting tourist. This peculiar incident piqued my interest, and I decided to adopt it as my unique alias.

description.sectionUp: The following is a summary of what you need in
description.sectionDown: a developer like me on my website

thinking.title: My thinking
thinking.secondContent: things that float on the surface we see.
thinking.thirdContent: driven by a desire to understand the “why” behind their functionality.
thinking.fourthContent: My inside-out approach enables me to build solutions that are robust and effective while continuously expanding my knowledge base
